begin-after-commit-hash.description: Start creating pull requests after this googleapis-gen commit hash.

image.description: Name of the docker image to run to post-process this repo, with tag.

cmd.description: The CMD arguments to pass to the docker image.

deep-copy-regex.description: Directories and files to copy from googleapis-gen

source.description: Source directory, as a regular expression to copy from googleapis-gen.

dest.description: Destination directory to copy files too.  Will usually refer to groups in the source regex with $1 syntax.

deep-remove-regex.description: Directories files to remove from the local repo before copying in new code.

deep-preserve-regex.description: Directories files in the local repo to leave untouched during copy and remove.
